title-part.text: ADDITIONAL WORK, SUCH AS EQUIPPING ROADS OR THE CONSTRUCTION OF PLATFORMS, HELICOPTER LANDING STAGES, SIGNS, SNOW FENCES, OR THE LIKE

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following groups:
E01F15/10 covered by E01F15/02

title-part.text: Arrangement or construction of additional equipment for roads or railways, Landing stages for helicopters
Construction of

CPC-specific-text.text: station or like

; Kerbs specially adapted for islands in traffic areas

by shearing or tearing, e.g. having weakened zones

CPC-specific-text.text: ,e.g. shiftable lines, line location transferable by selective illumination, rectractable lane delineating posts

title-part.text: Embedding pads or other sensitive devices in paving or other road surfaces

the barrier being formed by obstructing members situated on, flush with, or below the traffic surface, e.g. with inflatable members on the surface

with obstructing members moving in a translatory motion, e.g. vertical lift barriers, sliding gates

CPC-specific-text.text: vertical or

title-part.text: horizontal axis parallel to the road direction, i.e. swinging gates
